about.details:
Madhav Copper Ltd (MCL) is engaged in the manufacturing and supply of enamelled copper wire and poly wrap submersible winding wire under the brand name ―Madhav Copper‖. MCL also offers enamelled, copper rod profile and poly-wrap submersible winding wires suitable for industry application in transformers, motors, alternators, contactors, and relays. Company’s product is also suitable for use in high speed coil winding machines. The copper conductors are manufactured from copper and insulated with high thermal class engineered insulation material, which provides dielectric properties and resistance to stress cracking.

The manufacturing facility of Madhav Copper Ltd is situated at Plot No. 5-B/B, Block No. 226-27, Survey No. 346-47, Near Kobdi, Ukharla, Talaja Road, Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India.

MCL is promoted by Nilesh Patel who has experience in LME copper trading and Rohitbhai Chauhan who has a decade of experience in the field of copper wire manufacturing.

contactDetails.full_address: Madhav Copper Limited, Plot No. 2107/D Office No. 203, 2nd Floor D&I Excelus, Waghawadi Road

faqs.question: What is the Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO?
faqs.answer:
Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO is a SME IPO of 553600 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.48 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹81 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on January 23, 2017, and closes on January 27, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO opens on January 23, 2017 and closes on January 27, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO?
faqs.answer: Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,29,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Madhav Copper NSE SME IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
